name: Hot Pockets
instructions:
1)Melt mozzarela on microwave and mix it with almond flour
2)Open the mixture
3)Fill it with eggs and bacon
4)Take it to the oven (400F) for 20 minutes

Note: You can also try changing the fillings. I usually do it with cheese and turkey.
additionalInfo: This is perfect for when you want something easy and tasty.
